main event: A bright object, possibly a balloon or a star, was observed at Bunker Hill AFB, Indiana on October 8 and 10, 1959.
interesting points: The observation was made from the Bunker Hill AFB control tower and involved multiple military personnel., Observers described the object as a bright light that changed colors and was moving in an erratic manner., One of the F-102 pilots reported that the object looked like a star due to atmospheric conditions., Another witness observed a formation of 9 pinpoint lights traveling at high speed across the horizon., The investigation concluded the object was likely a star or balloon based on analysis from various observers.
sighted object: a bright white light of circular shape
witness description: military personnel including Major Frank S Kerchner, Captain John D Shoffstall and T/SGT Lee E Collins
